partners.title: Emma Bradford
partners.subtitle: Board of Directors at Good Vibes Barclona
partners.text: Inspiring The World With Acts Of Kindness. A group of positive, fun, loving people who meet to spread the joy of life through the community of Barcelona. We 1) Spread happiness, hope and trust in the community. 2) Connect us with other fun loving people living in Barcelona. 3) Build lasting memories for life

partners.title: Jacques Martiquet
partners.subtitle: Founder and Director at VYVIFY - Sparking Vitality into Humanity
partners.text: VYVIFY is a social movement, a tribe of conscious partygoers, and an entertainment agency. Our mission is to spark vitality in humanity by creating electrifying social experiences centered on dance and cultivating connection and elation. We want to design a new party culture.

partners.title: Alex Nunn
partners.subtitle: Head of Movement Building at Action for Happiness
partners.text: Facilitator and organiser inspiring folk to take action for a happier and kinder world. Believes in solution focused change and non-violent direct action. Student of the Buddha
